price: Ɛda a Yεbεpari asͻ (wͻn) mu nsͻdene no, nokorε sε Yεbɛtua wͻn bͻne no so ka
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yawma nabṭishu al-baṭshata al-kub'rā innā muntaqimūna
